cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("join")

	JOIN("geo", "ip", "-")
	JOIN("", "ip", "-")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: join
processors:
  - join:
      tag: join_ip_into_geo_54a83e8f
      field: ip
      separator: '-'
      target_field: geo
  - join:
      tag: join_ip_2520e930
      field: ip
      separator: '-'
